website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for a budget platform bed that offers plenty of utility and storage room.
pros: Sturdy metal bed frame provides support
Very durable with minimal noise and squeaks
Easy to assemble and arrange in a room
Plenty of height beneath the bed for extra storage
cons: Different size holes between the headboard and bed frame

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We simply love this bed frame. Im a big girl and my boyfriend is by no means a small man. We haven't had any issues with it, it makes no noise when we "get busy" and it's holding up just fine. Super easy to assemble. I did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up very sturdy as well also comes with its own tools
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Center bars dont fit
customer_reviews.text: Center bars are too short. Sat on bed and bars gave in causing me to fall. Slept on it one night. Useless product. Do not recommend AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely defective, it's almost as if it's made from limp plastic. I am so ungodly disappointed. I weigh 220, and live alone with my dog. So it isn't like there's an insane amount of weight (or more than one person) breaking this frame. I purchased it last Thursday, today is Monday. So it went four night and is now completely unusable. The metal has bent like a child's toy and can't even be slept on now. I am so highly disappointed, I don't have money to throw around to buy another frame as a broke college kid so now I have to go without again. I hope no one else makes this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sterdy, perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was SUPER easy to put together!! And very sterdy! Does not make any noise and does not move. Everything was numbered and it came with pictures and tools to tighten everything up! It is perfect for a mattress and no box spring and is a good height. Good for storage space. Perfect for someone with no tools or experience in putting things together. I am extremely happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bed frame was great for the first few months but then the little rubber bumpers that keep the mattress up started breaking the the rods starting coming out of the holders and started bending. Both me and my fiance that sleep on it weight about 250 lbs for the both of us. We are having to use luggage straps to band the frame together to just hold the mattress up. Will not recommend buying for the safety of anyone my fiance hit his head on the corner of the night stand cause that corner caved in. If i could get a refund it would be wonderful cause the quality and safety of those fruniture was not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mynar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height but sadly not as strong as you might ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height BUT sadly not as strong as you might think and I'm only 170 pounds for a king size bed it supposes​ to hold it firm but when you go on top of the bed you hear the metal move like small noises of metal. also, the side legs being pushed outside which is annoying that you have to push it back in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TomJFord

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very easy to assembly, it has different number tag on each and you just need to match those number in order to assembly. A lot better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: The only warning I have for anyone buying this bed frame is that major assembly is required. It ships in a large box and is literally a bunch of metal bars that all individually have to be snapped and screwed together. Still, the manufacturer does great here; they number every piece and with straightforward instructions, assembly becomes matching numbers labeled on every piece to numbers. The final product is a very stable, sturdy bed frame that does not bend or squeak. We have had it for a few weeks, but I can scarcely imagine this product ever wearing down.
customer_reviews.author: TComp

customer_reviews.title: yes it was horrible I am actually banged up
customer_reviews.text: This bed seemed alright when I put it up April 14, 2018. However weeks later (June 6) it has broke! I am not even 200 pounds and went to sit on the edge and all the crossbars were snapped where they attached.. yes it was horrible I am actually banged up, cut up, and has blood has had to be cleaned up. Cons- made so cheaply that the actually support bars broke, not just broke but broke out of no where gently sitting on me bed. Do not buy this. There are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Chasidy

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up and way sturdy. I am happy with this purchase. I ordered this for my college bed so that I could fit items underneath and its the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattress slides all over this frame, do not buy unless you like shoving your mattress off of your bedside table every morning!!! Very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Higher bed, metal frame, great choice
customer_reviews.text: I think this a remarkably good purchase. First, the box was heavy, but really small and we'll packed, making it easy to move. Second, lots of connections to make, but I was done in fifteen minutes after spending two.minutes using the guide to position pieces. Third, it is sturdy and gives me good storage under the bed. Fourth, it is a better height, and the family enjoys sitting on it without sliding off. I am sure the other models of this bed are also well constructed and are easy to assemble, but the two inches of extra height make this bed so much better.
customer_reviews.author: A reader after truth

customer_reviews.title: Easiest bed frame I’ve ever put together!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me and my girlfriend 5 minutes from unboxing to placing the mattress on it. It came with the best largest print and pictures to put it together plus they included a ratcheting Allen wrench, a standard Allen wrench and the normal stamped metal wrench for tightening bolts. Frame looks good and is sturdy. * this is not a paid for review or compensated review. I paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Neat

customer_reviews.title: great frame
customer_reviews.text: i've only been sleeping on this frame for 2 nights, but i love it so far. it seems to be very sturdy. i live in rural alaska, and it isn't easy to get items like this shipped to where i live, but thankfully this arrived - and fast, too. it normally takes me twice as long to get mail, but this came in just about a week, which i greatly appreciated as i have been in desperate need of a good bed frame. i am not the least bit mechanically inclined, but i managed to put it together by myself without killing myself or anyone else. the mattress doesn't slide around. very, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Its the worst bed we ever been on
customer_reviews.text: Its the worst bed we ever been on. Do not be fooled by the price, its a waste....the sounds will keep the whole neighbors awake. squeakiest bed in the universe.
customer_reviews.author: Edris

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed in June. It began to break in July starting with the middle support bar. I have attempted to contact seller twice with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Don&Missy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Sturdy, and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to assemble, and works as described. We bought a memory foam mattress a few months ago, but were still using our old box spring and squeaky frame. Using those, the mattress was comfortable, but a bit too soft, and it was always sliding around on the box spring. Changing to this frame is like night and day. The mattress is way more comfortable, since it's providing more support. It's also not sliding around now, and getting in and out of bed is a perfectly silent affair. On top of that, we have a bunch of new storage space under the bed! I'd definitely recommend this frame, especially to anyone with a memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This frame was very straightforward to put together, just following the directions. It is a little creaky, but not too bad compared to other frames. With all of us on the bed, we are well over 500 lbs and it is very sturdy and seems well made. I didn't take a tape measure, but our king mattress on top is slightly smaller than the frame. Not sure if the mattress is designed to be larger or if maybe our king mattress is not actually a king size. Either way, the size is not significant enough to make it look weird, but I thought I'd mention it. Overall, a great frame for the money!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple frame. Came within 5 business days of ordering, and only took about 20 minutes to out together by myself. Hardest part was getting my 12" mattress on top of it because the non slip strips we're really clinging onto it! I love how high it sits, giving me plenty of room to store things underneath instead the corner of our closetless room. The frame is sturdy and doesn't creak when we move.
customer_reviews.author: Kcat

customer_reviews.title: Queen size; very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought mine in April 2018. Really easy to put together, I did it by myself. Queen size. Just follow the numbered steps. I've had no issues with noise, squeaking or creaking. Plenty of space underneath to store stuff. I can get 4 regular laundry baskets on each side for a makeshift trundle. This frame is extremely sturdy. I'm not a small girl 5'6" 190lbs. Of course I "tested" out the frame in other ways 😉😉 Held up very well. He's not a small guy 6'3" 300 lbs. I'm currently using this frame for the 12" Green Tea Memory Foam. Very happy with this product. Will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Kullenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great frame, but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the round corner queen bed frame and as far as the bed frame goes, it's great quality, sturdy, was easy to assemble, no worries. However, a few months down the line I wanted to attach a headboard to it. Alas, the round corner version does not allow for it. The square corner version is $40 cheaper AND allows for a headboard, although it is slightly lower. I'm having a lot of trouble finding nice upholstered freestanding headboards, ugh I wish I had gone with the square corner bed frame instead, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Montclair

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Works great with 12" memory foam mattress. The slats are just wide enough. If you have a skinnier mattress it may be too flimsy and the slats will be an issue. 16" frame gives you a ton of room underneath for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Fake name real review

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Does the job fine however does creak when turning in bed. Really love the height tho makes a great storage area under the bed
customer_reviews.author: AXXR

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself, arthritic women in her 70's, so it took me longer than you young folks. After I spent 10 minutes scratching my head about the picture instructions showing A, B, C but not seeing letters on the parts, only numbers, I read a few reviews which explained the situation, and i was able to proceed. Very study. The instructions on the box foam mattress was to walk on it a lot to break it in. So I can confirm this base is sturdy, because walking on it did not produce a sound. I can store lots of things under this bed - lots of things I need for when my little grandson visits.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Honestly way better than a bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have a design degree so trust me when I say this is way better than spending thousands on a bed set. The look of this frame alone is contemporary and modern, black finish so it goes well in any room. If you want to add a bed skirt its easy and will allow you to hide storage. I personally keep my shoes lined up underneath and it looks clean and organized. Easy assembly great support and it doesnt squeak. If you wish to have a back board you can easily add one while keeping everything visually pleasing. I've bought 2 of these, queen and double, love them. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a headboard, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is fine, although contrary to many reviews it was NOT easy to assemble. Some of the pieces (specifically #4) did not fit and required some hammering and lubrication :). That said, it's sturdy, but you will not be able to attach a headboard. I read the Q&A section and people said you could which is why I bought the frame in the first place. There are no holes to attach a headboard. I've read some folks used zip ties in desperation. We'll see how that works out...
customer_reviews.author: MS_SF

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy & love the storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.text: It only took about 15 to 20 minutes to assemble. When assembled it is very sturdy. No wiggles. We put 8" foam mattress on top and it holds it up fine. there are some sticky strips applied to some of the spines to hold things in place, which didn't really hold the bed skirt in place even. But, there is still very minimal moving of the mattress. I can easily move the frame, it is not so heavy. We have been sleeping on them for over a month now. very happy with purchase. Oh I can put 6 - 14" high by 24" long plastic storage boxes under a twin mattress.
customer_reviews.author: gee gayle!

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money...!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame after being impressed with the twin version. However, this one is disappointing and doesn't even assemble correctly. After spending hours on assembling and having used help when we could not have the middle rod join, we left is as is and that has been annoying me every night. It makes irritating sound. The leg cushions have torn apart and have been scratching our hardwood floors. I hope the makers take notice of the design flaws and correct them. I had to buy another bed frame in less than six months. I wish I could you have had a return policy that would cover me for that.
customer_reviews.author: Manu Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: All of The plastic ends on the slats broke within a month making them not fit securely. I had to constantly adjust the slats because they were so lose and I even had to put a large board between the frame and the mattress to help me be able to sleep at night. Last night a few of the slats fell all the way through putting myself and the mattress on the floor. Very poor quality. I would never buy this product again. It’s only myself sleeping and I’m not a very large person I can’t image two people trying to lay down on it without the entire frame collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: works with headboard
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this frame. it is very sturdy feeling. I am glad to finally be rid of my old box. no more creaking sounds, no more swaying bed. this is far better than a useless box. this is also very easy to clean under due to the extra room. this frame was able to bolt to my headboard without issue. I found (on amazon) soft feet covers to protect my hardwood floors that fit this frame perfectly. I am including them in the review for anyone who might be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, unstable and mattress slips off.
customer_reviews.text: This frame looks great and is incredibly easy and quick to assemble. Unfortunately, the screws come loose even with multiple attempts to tighten them (with and without the washers). Real talk: You can forget about "amorous activities" in bed unless you're really into the rattling/creaking noise it makes. Sounds like it will cave in under you! Also, you have to spend more money to buy a non-slip mat for this frame or else the mattress will slide around when you get in and out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Good for memory foam, bad for spring/pillow top.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this almost 2 years ago. I didn't want to fire off a half cocked review. My wife and I are still currently sleeping on this. It has really stood up against everything. No bending, flexing, breaking, etc. Everything works as advertised. However, I would not recommend this with a spring or hybrid mattress. You can feel the crossbars under the mattress when you move. Can I say for sure it wasn't a crappy mattress, no. But for the price I would recommend for a 10"+ foam mattress like casper, purple, ghostbed, etc. No for spring matresses, please heed me there.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Michaylo

customer_reviews.title: Best frame ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This frame was really easy to put together! I've never assembled a frame of any kind before and this took me under an hour. I can fit my storage totes under the bed as well as some exercise equipment. The sticky tape prevents the mattress from sliding and it is silent. I rolled around just to see and not a peep from the frame!! My last frame and box spring combo made nose just by looking at it! Now I don't even need a box spring! I will be getting a memory foam pad, just because the mattress itself is oddly thin and I can feel every bar, but thats just me. This frame is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Teonna

customer_reviews.title: Most noisy bed on the planet
customer_reviews.text: SO SQUEAKY. If you are looking for a sturdy bed this is NOT the bed for you. The first night was great, happy with our purchase. Second night started to creak a little and now? Like two months later? Can’t even move in bed without it waking the house up-literally. Forget having a quickie while the kids watch beauty and the beast in the living room on the other side of the house. Stay far away from this thing. The center brackets designed to hold the thing up broke because it moves so much. We’ve even tightened it twice after initial set up. Only plus I’ll give is ample storage space underneath. Otherwise, this thing is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, noiseless. However, it is designed so the mattress sits on top and any kind of movement makes the mattress slide around and slide off of the frame. Has to be in the corner for the mattress to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: TIANI BOBITCH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design but 3” Too Long
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on how to put this frame together could not have been better! Every single thing is numbered and it could not have made more sense. Unfortunately, for some reason It is just too long. I bought a standard king mattress which is 78 x 80 And the frame that I bought was for a king mattress. It’s pretty disappointing but there’s no way I could pack it up and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Of Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: For my son’s room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old. Plenty of room under the bed for storage (or a place to hide his dirty clothes) and really easy to assemble. Took about 15 minutes from start to finish. Note that this is a metal framed bed and after a week or two, you might want to go through and tighten the bolts again; our unit started to wobble and squeak within that time frame. Overall, a good bed. Simple, clean, modern looking. I can confidently recommend this bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Functioning bed frame
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bed frame, not really anything special. It wasn’t too hard to put together. There are spare parts, though I would have preferred if they had been packaged in a way that was easier to open and also resealable (as I now have to figure out what to do with the spare parts). Still, it’s a decent purchase and offers storage, which is what I wanted. Note that the 14" height is total under the bed but not the height clearance of the outer frame, so if you're trying to store something that's 14", you'd best either assemble the frame around it or lift the frame to put it under.
customer_reviews.author: suew

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame worked out perfect. After years of buying bedrooms sets, and my wife getting tired of the furniture, and forcing me to sell it, I decided to buy the cheapest bedframe I could find. I was surprised to find this reasonable sturdy bedframe. I noticed one review where the mattress was falling through the frame, and I must say that there is no way that could happen if assembled correctly. There is easy instructions to follow and it took me 20 min. There is 16" from the floor which gives plenty of room for storage underneath. I purchased a bed skirt with a 16" drop to hide all the stuff under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Heath

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy with detailed instructions. Took me around 1-1.5 hours to put everything together. The bed frame is heavy and has good build quality. I placed some folded cardboard boxed on the frames to avoid any damages to my mattress, since i have a spring mattress and was worried that gaps in the bars might cause the springs to pop down with time. There is ample storage space below the frame, i have 4 bags and 3 boxes stored underneath. One of the reasons i bought the 14 inch one. The bottom of the pillars are padded with plastic which is good for wooden floors.
customer_reviews.author: Arijit Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got the 16" with rounded edges. So much clearance underneath for easy cleaning and it sits up high. I'm 6'1, 240lbs and this bed doesn't sway or squeak. Very sturdy from the moment you tighten the screws. I wanted something that would last and my cats sleep under the bed most days. I would hate for the frame to break one night while they're under there. I dont have that worry now. The rounded corners are great. No more scrapped legs from bumping up against the bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Frame, very sturdy and easy to assemble Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Waters

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took 30 mins to assemble. I’m sure it would have been less if my helper was older than 3 years. :) Sturdy frame, simple instructions, ample under different storage, Conveniently came with all parts plus a few additional screws, as well as needed mini tools (if you don’t already have the correct size Allen wrench not a worry). Very happy with this purchase! I am buying another one right now for another twin mattress in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent king bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, well-constructed bed frame that was exactly what I wanted (except I would have preferred white, which is not available). The 16-inch height provides a lot of storage, and I like that it requires only a mattress and no box springs. This comes with all necessary hardware and tools needed to assemble it, along with spare hardware, which was fortunately not needed. I only briefly needed some help from my husband for placing the middle connecting bar, but otherwise assembled it myself in less than an hour. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Dell

customer_reviews.title: Well made!! Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Doesn’t squeak!! Doesn’t slip! The pictures show storage capacity for a regular size checked bag, and an extra large checked bag. Not a carry on! PLENTY of room. The other picture is supposed to show how tall it is with box springs as well as the mattress, even though you don’t need box springs. It comes up to my hip. This is well made, great for the price. I just don’t like the middle bar that is right in the wrong spot, too easy to stub your toe. But I’m not sure how they could make it that big without it. Overall, very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Madsen

customer_reviews.title: No mattress support at top or bottom of frame- box spring or other supports needed
customer_reviews.text: This says that you do not need a box frame, you do. The end of your mattress is not supported at all. We ended buying $10 shipping straps and creating extra braces for the end of the mattress. Other than no support at the top or bottom of the mattress, it is a good frame. Little to no noise, holds our weight well, we are about 550 lbs total). But the stickers that hold the frames to the mattress are unforgiving and the adhesive never goes away. It will also show up on the bottom of your sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Mackall

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions and coding on the parts made assembly easy, but not necessarily fast. The bed is very sturdy - I weight 300 lbs and do toss and turn a lot. The bed has not even loosened any joints in two months. It is recommended that a pad or board be used to keep any mattress from going between the slats. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Yingling

customer_reviews.title: 500 lbs. weight limit on a KING SIZE frame!!! Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically for the description, we didn't even take the frame out of the box. NOWHERE in the description, specs or even in the reviews does it state this frame has a 500lb limit for the KING size frame (including the mattress). I saw someone mention it in the question section so I researched online and found out the limit. I don't understand why anyone thinks that is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid bedframe.
customer_reviews.text: First, I am not some paid troll. I actually bought and assembled this product. Assembly took about 30 minutes. I have purchased so much low quality Chinese-manufactured goods over the years that looked good but on inspection were crap, that I expected the same with this. I was wrong. The packaging, instructions, and the pre-labeled decals on the frame made it very easy to assemble. I have bought about 8 bed frames in the last few years. Most were lightweight junk that didn't fit together well and were generally low quality (you get what you pay for). This is an incredibly well-engineered and manufactured product, especially considering the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Best bed every so happy love Amazon they never let ...
customer_reviews.text: Best bed every so happy love Amazon they never let ya down the bed was super easy to build very good material I'm sleeping like a baby a dry full baby lol
customer_reviews.author: Marlon R.

customer_reviews.title: This frame is exactly what I was looking for and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged securely and included all pieces, including extra pieces. Assembly was very easy with easy to understand diagrams. I love the rounded corners on outside legs, the height of the frame, and it’s sturdiness. We put a 12” king memory foam mattress on it and have now slept on it for a week. I chose not to expose the sticky tape surface on the slats and instead used commonly found rubber shelf non skid to keep the mattress from sliding. So far that is working fine. The frame is so solid that either of us can move and the bed stays absolutely still. I would recommend this product for purchase by others.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to assemble; I had to ask someone to read the directions for me.
customer_reviews.text: If you are anything like me then you freak out at the sight of a ton of numbered stickers and tools. I had purchased a south shore bed from Walmart in the past and the best thing about it is that it is lettered from A-Z, so you do not have the luxury of mistaking pieces. The south shore bed is better labeled, but this Zinus gets a 5-star review because it's faster to put together, less heavy, seems better material-wise, and did I mention that it was actually quite easy once I had someone read the instructions for the "1,2,1,2" pieces. I love something that is easy to assemble and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spencer GSU MBA

customer_reviews.title: I bought this new frame for my Hubby who is 390 lbs. it's a Great Frame!
customer_reviews.text: the frame was reasonably OK to put together, our mattress is like a sleep number bed but a different company, we slept much better on this as the old frame was sagging, Trust me this frame has NO Sagging at all! I did have to put some small, felt strips on the frame as the mattress would move over as we were getting on the bed or changing the sheets, the felt strips I purchased a Walmart worked just great, Love the frame, easy to vacuum under and i have bought several wicker baskets and now I store my extra blankets and sheet under, the wicker baskets have color to them and make area look nice and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbean2u

customer_reviews.title: easiest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised at the easy set up of this frame. There are no words in the instruction leaflet but none are necessary. Everything is labeled and I'm hoping when I move, I will be able to disassemble and reassemble with as much ease. I'm a 67 year old woman and put this together all by myself. I've only slept on it one night so don't know yet how it will hold up over time but for ease of assembly, it gets a five.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and Linenspa's hybrid mattress, and this came first so i decided to put it together. I can work on cars all day, but i cant put shelves together to save my life. But this really is idiot-proof. Line numbers up to numbers, and use the bolts/nuts. instructions are very detailed, and even comes with its own little ratchet to use for the bolts! I put it together by myself in about 30-ish minutes, with walking into the other room to bring the other pieces in. With the bed on and 2 people on the bed, there is 0 signs of it bending, breaking, etc. if you want a cheap, quality frame, I'd highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What I like. It is very sturdy and easy to assemble. Good quality for the price. What I would change. It is a little to high for my mattress. I am 5' 6" and have a 16" mattress so it is just slightly higher that I like. Also the support bars are too far apart so I put plywood under the mattress to keep it from sagging between the gaps. However this makes my mattress slide a bit. Overall I do recommend this product in the 14 inch model.
customer_reviews.author: Doularoz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, needs assembly
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble it but it took some work. The assembly instructions were good for the most part. One thing that was not clear in the instructions is that you should place the metal inside the other metal on the sides of the frame. If you don't do that, the frame is squeaky. If you do that, the frame is super solid. So it makes a big difference. There is no way of folding this so storage would be difficult. It is really lightweight tho.
customer_reviews.author: Chereen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Probably better if you don't live in an old house with slightly uneven floorboards. If you do it moves a bit as it's not that heavy. Would recommend a non slip rubber disc for under feet. East to assemble if you don't let the hardware slip...ouch! Good little hardware wrench though! Put it together alone, putt matting down if you have expensive floors with nobody to help you assemble as one side falls doing it alone. True to size. Fit my mattress perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - exactly what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: A friend got this platform frame. It was exactly what I was looking for, so I ordered one. Arrived very timely. I easily verified every piece needed was received. Impressed that no only did the screws and bolts come included, the needed tools also were included; very smooth to assemble. Follow the directions. That is all you need to do - it went together very easily. If you have a 2nd person to help, it will be faster - but I did it on by myself and had no problems (60+ year old female, 5'4", 120 lbs). Highly recommend. I got the twin size mattress fits perfectly. Very simple to make up with linens. Very comfortable. Highly recommen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer gsm

customer_reviews.title: So. Squeaky.
customer_reviews.text: I am unhappily aware every time my daughter moves. Every time the dog jumps in her bed. Every time she sits up, lays down, gets in or out of bed- I. Am. Aware. No matter where I am in our two story house, I hear it. I have never encountered a louder bed. How do people sleep on this?!?!?! We replaced it. I'm keeping it to give my brother someday, as payback for the time he bought my toddler a drum set.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice base!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the comedic twit in the video, ours went together in a 1/2 hour tops including several beer rental breaks and lunch. Just don't let them ship on anything other than a freight carrier - UPS/FedEx- and make sure it is not transferred to USPS for any reason...took the idiots two days to deliver it..because "it's big and heavy". Anyhow, nice product, will recommend checking and tightening the bolts again in a few days, then weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Great frames in both price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great frames. I ordered 2 in queen and one in king. Assembling the first one took me awhile to put together but after that the other two were a piece of cake. Assembled all 3 by myself no problems. Very sturdy and seem strong. Love the height on these and not using a box spring on any of them. Plenty of slats included that there is no issue of mattresses falling through as I have read can happen on other frames when not using a boxspring. All 3 are using mattresses in a box and look great on these. Very pleased with price and product.
customer_reviews.author: ERambo

customer_reviews.title: VERY SQUEAKY!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy at first but after about 2 or 3 months it starts squeekign and moving. Like you could touch it with your hand and it squeaks and moves. Like it's not sturdy anymore. I'm nto sure why but... I wouldn't advise you to buy it if these cons would be a problem for you. It is a problem for me but what can I do right but just be grateful for what I have compared to those who have not. UPDATE: it's squeaky and moving when it wants to be. IDK why because I didn't do anything different. So 🤷
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy.  Easy to assemble. Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I serioulsy bought this because a Marine wrote a glowing review and I’m a Marine mom. He was absolutely spot on (of course-he’s a Devil Dog!). Hubby gets frustrated I order stuff that come in with parts because he does the assembly. Had this done in less than half an hour, no cursing (that’s HUGE) and it’s super sturdy. Rounded corners on the legs. bonus! So glad I followed my heart on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy metal frame.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this frame for a memory foam mattress. I also purchased a bunkie board to place on top of metal slats Both have worked out very well. I love that there is plenty of room underneath the frame for storage. Very sturdy metal frame. Relatively easy to assemble provided you READ the instructions. Also purchased a bunkie board for top of frame as I wasn't sure a memory foam mattress would adapt well to metal slats.
customer_reviews.author: Madalena

customer_reviews.title: Hardy frame for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed frame. We have had it for 3 weeks and it has held up great. We initially used it with a standard spring mattress and it worked, however you could hear the springs rubbing against the frame which made an awful noise. We have upgraded to a foam mattress and its so much quitier. The height of the frame is great, we store our clothes basket underneath. We also are happy with the weight strength. Between my boyfriend and myself we are about 700 pound and it supports us no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-designed frame.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to raise our bed higher because we're getting older and it's easier to get in and out of bed now. The space underneath is great for storing extra blankets, sheets, clothes and other stuff. The frame was very easy for the two of us to assemble. Good instructions and all pieces were clearly labeled. It took us about an hour. I don't know what the weight rating is, but together, we're around 650 (includes pets too). The frame seems to be very sturdy, even if a kid is jumping on the bed. It looks nice enough on its own, but we did buy a bed skirt to hide things stored under it.
customer_reviews.author: Jadziacatz

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bed frame. Fits my king perfectly. Came with double sided tape that I didn't understand at first lol but now I understand. The tape works perfectly at keeping the mattress from sliding around at all! Very happy with the quality, strength, price, and ease of assembly. Don't waste your money on those cheap folding bed frames (I did) save yourself the aggravation and buy this quality bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Katrinacop

customer_reviews.title: Boxspring not necessary and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This foundation supports my full-sized bed and does it well. Not long after I purchased this foundation and assembled it, I had to disassemble it for a relocation. Total disassembly took me, half hour tops. You end up unscrewing the supporting legs, splitting it in half. I only sleep in my bed, so I can't rate anything beyond that, but judging on other reviews, it'll withstand just about anything reasonable. For a foundation made of metal for under $100, and one that comes in a long tube that would likely fit into a sedan with seats folded down, I'm impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rana II

customer_reviews.title: Silent and sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: We have this frame in a twin. Concerned about the bad reviews regarding broken welds, but so far it has held up well. No noise, no signs of weak welds. It is on carpet so no danger of sliding around. We do keep some things under there and appreciate the storage space now that we have gotten rid of the box spring. Relatively easy to put together and a good price. It only works with a conventional inner spring mattress; the thin metal slats won't accommodate memory foam or latex. The bed skirt needs frequent adjustment to keep hiding the legs. Will update this review if it breaks or starts to squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! Bought it for my friends room. Her bed broke so she needed a new one. When we opened up the box it was superrrr intimidating. But it ended up being super easy! Detailed instructions were great. Only recommendation is to read carefully because I jumped ahead and pulled off all the white strips from the bars that were supposed to hold the mattress in place (whoops)! Turned out totally fine though. The frame is pictured here leaning against her old headboard which we kept for the aesthetics. On top of the frame is a box spring, mattress and topper. Managed to slide large suitcases under the bed—plenty of storage under there. Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: What a great frame. Came in a relatively small box considering what it turns into. Had lots of pieces, but came with tools to put together. The instructions are pictures only. No actual written words. Took about 10 minutes to put together. Very sturdy. Great for me cuz my apartment is 2nd floor & stairs are very narrow. It would be impossible to get a queen box spring up the stairs. This is my 1st queen sized bed. Also my 1st non box spring & I am loving it so far. Plenty of room under the bed now too if you wanted to store stuff.
customer_reviews.author: S. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Product
customer_reviews.text: There are no written instructions (simple 1-2-3 diagram) which sounds OK until you realize that you are missing the specific instructions as to which hardware to use in which locations. Maybe an instruction sheet was missing but it was easy enough to figure out. My main problem was having to use a bench grinder to take a 16th of an inch off a portion of a leg in order to get the assembly holes to line up. For a cheap frame, it's sturdy enough but next time I will take a closer look at country of origin. The money I saved on this cheaper product was more than eaten up in wasted time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Buxman

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SIMPLE TO ASSEMBLE - even while drinking margaritas.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, which was good and bad. Great that it arrived ahead of schedule but bad because the husband was out of town and our new mattress was also due in...which meant i had to put the thing together by myself. So, me, a pitcher of margaritas (don't judge, i didn't know what i was in for), RHOC on tv and I settled on to the floor to get this thing built. I was literally done in 20 min. by myself, only one margarita in. That said, the rest of the pitcher did not go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: simasek

customer_reviews.title: IF I COULD GIVE 0 STARS I WOULD
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE. HORRIBlE. HORRIBLE. I bought this model bed 2 times and both times the bed frame caved in. I am less than 120lbs and have the bed just for myself so there is no reason why it should cave with very little weight. DONT BUY THIS JUNK. I WILL HAVE TO BUY A 3rd bed this year (since May)- PATHETIC of AMAZON to have this bed as one of their top picks and PATHETIC of this company to sell faulty products. The bars that go along the bed are not long enough and tend to bend after little use. VERY MADDDDDDD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bre Collins

customer_reviews.title: Warning for parents of toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easy to put together and doesn’t make any noise so far but just a warning for parents with children. The corner of ours was not flush when the screws were put in. Not sure if it’s a bad weld on the bar but this piece is very sharp and caused injury to our little one who likes to step on the bar to get up. We covered with corner protectors but feel like this should be flush rather that exposed sharp metal. Otherwise this is a fantastic affordable platform frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Frame, happy with my buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bed frame is great, true to platform with plenty of space underneath for storage (or for pets) to hide underneath in. Very Sturdy, non wiggly nor makes any noises. Does not slide on hardwood floors. All tools needed to assemble the Frame where included in the box. Setup was easy and instructions were simple enough for my 5 year old to direct me to do. Only downfall was that packaging was too secure, the zipties holding the frame parts together were too tight that I was having trouble trying to get under neath the ties with scissors to cut them, resulting in me cutting my finger. Nothing too major but at least the packaging was secure in transit to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first 16 inch metal platform bed frame because the frame on my daughter's bed collapsed. The height was perfect to match the bookcase headboard from the old bed and allowed for lots of under-bed storage. When she went off to college last year, she complained a lot about the bed frame the apartment management provided. After moving to a different apartment this year, she said she wanted a frame exactly like the one I bought for her bed at home. This time she also put those lift cubes on the feet of the frame which provides even more under-bed storage.
customer_reviews.author: PenguinMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for spare rooms!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bed for my spare room! I have storage space to fit containers underneath. My best friend and I were able to put it together in about half an hour. Make sure you have an extra set of hands and you’ll be golden!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Height and NO Noise!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! It is a nice height! Assembly was easy, I did it alone. There are layers of foam on the support bars. Assist with keeping the mattress stationary, at all times. There is no squeaking or any sound. I worried with a metal frame there may be some noise. There is none! I have only hit my toe once really bad on a leg. I like not needing a box spring! It looks nice in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twin size perfect for plus size!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so let's start this out, I am a plus size person who bought a twin. I am well over 300 pounds and this thing is so solid and doesn't move!! I have flopped down on it stood up on it and nothing!! I even sit at the edge and it doesn't move!! If you are a plus sized person I would definitely get this!! Storage wise, not that tall enough to put totes under it, I would barely get a basket of clothes under there! Hopefully they can make it taller for the next person who buys it for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and the seller provided the tools needed to put this together along with extra parts. I was able to put it together no problem while having a 5 year old, two year old and two dogs under foot. It's very sturdy and holds up with well with two wild boys jumping on and from the bed. Seller also contact me via email to check up on product. Highly reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, Very Stable, Doesnt Shake or Makes any noise
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of the good experiences from Zinus. Though it takes atleast an hour to assemble and make the frame, the final product turns out great, in terms of functionality. Its very stable very sturdy, makes no kind of noise, It looks quite strong, and is designed very effectively to virtually withstand any human body weight. I think for the price its a great bargain, the only thing to remember is that you ll need some work trying to assemble it when it arrives neatly packed in pieces. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Wahib

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, but squeaky
customer_reviews.text: This frame was very squeaky at first, and I could feel the bars under my memory foam mattress (no box spring). I ended up taking the frame back apart and applying a light grease to every single joint, and cutting 1/4" plywood to cover the whole frame. Now it's quiet and comfortable but I feel like I shouldn't have to do that and not everyone might have the tools to make those modifications.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and ease of assembly
customer_reviews.text: Zinus made something as mundane and potentially annoying as putting together a bed frame into a pleasurable experience. The instructions were clear and exceptionally easy to follow, and the parts and tools were all perfectly organized and presented. (And they give you a cute little ratchet as well!) There is a grippy anti-squeak material along the middle bars that ensures less/no squeaking, which is a huge plus. Good quality in person; my frame didn’t arrive with any imperfections and the finish was consistent throughout. It also didn’t require two people to wrangle and was easy to put together on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this item cause a buddy of mine recommend it and he was right, it was worth it. It isn't hard to put together by yourself or with another person helping. The bed is good and strong for someone of my body build. I would highly recommend you get this bed frame if you are looking for quality. Also when you put this bed frame together, remember to make sure the bars and everything lines up and are flush together when you bolt them together and also make sure you tighten the bolts down well and I know that it will improve the bed frame life span.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and squeaky
customer_reviews.text: This bed wobbles quite a bit (we assembled it fairly tightly) and is very squeaky. Every time my husband rolls over, it sounds like a low-budget porn and I get seasick. On the plus side: it was fairly easy to assemble, the height is really good for storage, the support slats feel sturdy, and the non-skid stickies on the slats keep the mattress nicely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Twin size
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy build and very well made. It was simply and quick to assemble. It is definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tome P.

customer_reviews.title: Not one bad thing to say
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfect. I love being able to store stuff under my bed with ease - 16 inches is lot of space. Not to mention this bad boy doesn't make a sound when getting out of bed. I've thought several times my girlfriend was still in bed, only to turn over and she's not there. That might be a combination of my mattress AND bed frame, but I don't care. All you need is the mattress and bed frame. Not needing a box spring is a wonderful thing when you buy a mattress-in-a-box because of transportation limitations. I didn't have time to be at the door to accept a massive delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Solid bed frame went together easily once you learn to read the instructions. The non slip tape on the support rails was a fabulous idea. All parts included plus extras. I’m not deducting a star for assembly as the product is the best bed frame I’ve used so far. That being said, the instructions and parts will confuse you for about 10 minutes. Instructions tell you to assemble a frame that’s marked A-G yet no part had any lettering, only multiple numbers. You matched the numbers at the joint to assemble the frame. Now, once it’s assembled, you can clearly see what the manufacturer was thinking with all the numbered stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a new bed frame that didn't require a box spring. This was perfect. It's 16" high so I can store things underneath my bed and because it's high, I was able to toss out the box spring that was becoming squeaky. This item was a lot smaller than I expected it to be but once you put it together, it's perfect. It's not heavy so you can move it around yourself. It's probably easier to build with two people just to keep things leveled but I was able to do this alone in about 40 minutes, give or take. Great product. I've already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee. Em.

customer_reviews.title: 8.5" off the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan of tall beds, and Zinus seems to offer a rather limited selection fitting that criteria. What few there are are end up being comfortably more expensive than this bombproof frame, which I had previously purchased and set up for my mother. The solution? Buy another, and break out the ol' hacksaw! Trimmed 8.5" off of each leg, ground them smooth, filed the rough edges, and got to work. Even with these self-imposed extra steps, I was rockin' and rollin' with a sturdy new bedframe, just tall enough to slide a couple long gun cases under, in about an hours time.
customer_reviews.author: Fsac

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This metal platform bed was the best price I saw, which attracted my attention. It arrived on time, and came packaged well. The instructions were easy to follow, and after I laid everything out on the floor, it took about 30 minutes to put together. There is a numbering system to match up the pieces. Was not too heavy, but yet feels extremely sturdy. It has plenty of storage room underneath. The slats have some type of coating in places that have a "sticky" feel, and this keeps the mattress from sliding. We got the full size for our small bedroom, rounded corners. It holds the 10-inch mattress well. We love it, feel we got a wonderful deal!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara72

customer_reviews.title: BEST INSTRUCTIONS FOR ASSEMBLY EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: omg! I love this bed frame! *Its easily tall enough to fit regular sized tote underneath. *Best instructions I have EVER..seen. *Easy to put together even just one person. * Don't use wrenches (just finger tight). Once completely assembled, tighten with the tools. * Don't remove the sticker strips from rails unless you plan to make the mattress flop around a lot(😉). Just buy that slip resistant shelf paper and place under mattress. Plus, you don't want sticky residue on mattress when you turn it over. This bed frame is sturdy and absolutely a bargain for the price. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this bedframe. I've bought a Zinus bed frame before and it was great, but not this one. This one slides all over the place. They give you sticky tape attached to the support cross beams in the attempt to get your mattress not to slide, it doesn't work. It makes tons of noise, and moves every single time you get on it. I sit very softly and only weigh 220, and the whole frame slides.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very simple to put together. In fact I had my 18 yo son and 14 yo daughter put it together in the middle of the night by themselves. This bed frame looks good and what surprised me the most was it has sticky strips on the cross members that hold the mattress in place. Products like this make having a king size bed affordable for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: TIM H.

customer_reviews.title: I can fit 6 large bins under the bed now!
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage and definitely sturdy but it was not as easy to assemble as some describe and I find myself decently good at this kind of thing. Once I understood the meaning of the letters/numbers it made total sense and it went quickly. The screws strip easily so be diligent and very careful you align them exact, or else you could end up with a wobbly frame. Definitely recommend a team of two for assembly for this reason. My one complaint is that I keep stubbing my toe/shin on the center pole, as I’m used to my old metal frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous with the price. Actually am VERY happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed by this frame. It's super light weight, and the sturdiness is amazing. I think I will be going to get more of these in the near future. I am sharing an image of my daughter lifting it to show how light weight it is. As well as how well the grip is to the none slip strips for the mattress. (It stays put!)
customer_reviews.author: ~Dawn~

customer_reviews.title: Strong materials, squeaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, (directions for dummies), the material is sturdy but once put together I noticed after a week or so it would squeak when getting on or off. All the bolts were to get so not sure what it is. Tall enough for EASY storage, I have storage cubes that fit perfectly underneath. Loved that it had sticky pieces for your mattress to reduce sliding ( I personally used for my bed skirt)
customer_reviews.author: Dot Thompson

product_meta.title: Zinus Yelena 14 Inch Classic Metal Platform Bed Frame with Steel Slat Support / Mattress Foundation, Queen
product_meta.description: Style:Square corner| Size:QueenThe Yelena steel 14 inch classic platform bed by Zinus provides strong support for your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress. This Yelena platform bed is 14 inches high with clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage. Openings in two of the legs allow for attaching a headboard to this platform bed. Headboard and mattress not included. The Zinus classic metal platform bed provides reliable and durable mattress support, another comfort innovation from Zinus.
feature_bullets: Strong steel slat support will increase mattress life while eliminating the need for a box spring
12 inches of clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage space
Foam padded tape is added to the steel frame for noise free use
5 year worry free limited warranty / Zinus Modern Studio tables can be purchased separately.Total Weight Capacity: 500 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars14,216 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
